definition[0]: a strong unreasonable fear of something
example[0]: Owen has a phobia about snakes.
example[1]: Some children suffer from school phobia.
definition[1]: a strong unreasonable dislike or fear of something, which may be part of a mental illness
example[2]: claustrophobia  (=fear of being in a small enclosed space)
definition[2]: a dislike or hatred of something
example[4]: Anglophobia  (=a dislike of English or British things)
